document: THE JEWS IN MEXICO: A HISTORY WITH SPECIAL EMPHASIS ON THE PERIOD FROM 1857 TO 1930 By Corinne Azen Krause A.B.. University of Michigan, 1948 M.A. Carnegie Institute of Technology, 1956 Submitted to the Graduate Faculty of Arts and Sciences in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy University of Pittsburgh 1970
